name: The Desert Sessions
description: '''The Desert Sessions''' are a musical collective series, founded by [[Josh Homme]] in 1997. Artists such as [[Brant Bjork]], [[PJ Harvey]], [[Twiggy Ramirez]], [[David Catching|Dave Catching]], [[Nick Oliveri]], [[Mark Lanegan]], [[John McBain (musician)|John McBain]], [[Ben Shepherd]], [[Josh Freese]], [[Chris Goss (U.S.)|Chris Goss]], [[Alain Johannes]], [[Troy Van Leeuwen]], [[Dean Ween]], [[Les Claypool]] and many others from the [[Palm Desert Scene]] have contributed as songwriters and musicians.
